general_advisory: Use the specified pesticides and methods to manage pests and diseases for the mentioned crops. Apply necessary nutrients and fertilizers as advised.

advisory: Manage Aphids population with neem-based pesticide or chemical sprays.
Use yellow sticky traps for monitoring pests.
Manage Sawfly infestation by irrigation and manual collection of grubs.
Plant garlic varieties like Agrifound white or Jamuna Safed.
Treat garlic cloves with Carbendazim before planting.
Monitor and manage aphids with yellow sticky traps and appropriate pesticides.
Control Early Leaf Blight disease with specified fungicides.
Apply borax as soil application to prevent Brown rot in Cole crops.
Manage Leaf eating caterpillar with biological methods or chemical sprays.
